settings.text: Welcome to
FAQ
Find quick and clear answers to the most commonly asked questions about our products, ordering process, shipping, returns, and more.

settings.title: Is my payment data safe with you?
settings.text: All direct payment gateways adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover.

settings.title: Do you accept online payments?
settings.text:
Yes, we accept online payments. All payment processing and vital customer information is quick, easy, and secure.

Learn more about our store's safe checkout experience (powered by Shopify) here.

settings.title: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.text: We accept payments from major credit card companies like Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay.

settings.title: Can I pay with Visa gift card?
settings.text: Unfortunately, we do not accept any kind of gift card.

settings.title: Can I use two discount codes at the same time?
settings.text: Discount codes cannot be used in conjunction with any other discount code, offer, or promotion. Store credits are also considered discounts, so you cannot use a discount code in addition to store credit.

settings.title: What should I do if a discount code is not working?
settings.text: Please try changing your browser and clearing your cookies. If the code still does not work, please contact us here for assistance.

settings.title: Is my personal information safe?
settings.text: ArtDesigna respects your privacy and ensures that our user database is protected by law. Your personal data is securely protected from unauthorized access, and we will never distribute any personal information submitted to our website. For more details, please read our Privacy Policy here.

settings.title: Payments & Safety
How long does it take to get my products?
settings.text:
Glass Wall Art: Production time is 2-4 business days. Shipping time is an additional 3-5 business days.
Wooden Wall Art: Production time is 4-6 business days. Shipping time is an additional 3-5 business days.
Metal Wall Art: Production time is 1-3 business days. Shipping time is an additional 3-5 business days.
Moss & Olive Wood Wall Art: Production time is 5-10 business days. Shipping time is an additional 3-5 business days.

settings.title: How much does shipping cost?
settings.text: We offer Free Express Shipping on every order.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.text: Yes, we ship our products all over the globe.

settings.title: Will I receive an order confirmation email?
settings.text: Yes, you will receive a confirmation email as soon as you place your order. Please check your spam folder as well and double check that the email you used to place your order is correct, if not, please reach out to us at support@artdesigna.com with the correct/new email and we will send you a new confirmation email.

settings.title: Can I change or add another item to my order?
settings.text: Yes, we can assist with this if the request is made within 24 hours of placing your order. After this period, we may not be able to accommodate changes as the order may already be printed, packaged, or shipped.

settings.title: Shipping & Delivery
Do you offer warranty for your products?
settings.text:
We are proud to offer a Limited Lifetime Warranty on all our products.

Glass Products

  • Indoor Use: 5-Year limited warranty
  • Outdoor Use: 2-Year limited warranty


Covers:

  • UV print adhesion
  • Color retention


Excludes:

  • Improper installation or handling
  • Accidental damage (e.g., drops or impacts)

The 5-year period is based on extensive testing and our confidence in the longevity and performance of our materials under normal use conditions. While glass is inherently a strong and resilient material, factors such as exposure to direct sunlight, varying temperatures, and humidity levels can gradually affect any art piece over time.

By providing a 5-year warranty, we strike a balance between offering you long-term protection and ensuring the sustainability and affordability of our products. Rest assured, this warranty covers any manufacturing defects or issues with the materials or workmanship.

Wooden Wall Art

  • Coverage: Defects in materials and workmanship (e.g., warping, cracks, loose joints)
  • Transportation Damage: Notify us within 7 days of receipt for any damage


Excludes:

  • Natural variations in color, texture, and finish

Making a Claim

  1. Notify us within 7 days of receipt
  2. Provide proof of purchase and photos of defect/damage


Resolution:

  • Repair or replace the product

Contact: support@artdesigna.com

settings.title: Do you offer a framing service?
settings.text: No, we do not offer a framing service. Our glass products are designed to look their best without any frame, allowing their beauty and quality to stand out on their own.

settings.title: How do I clean my glass wall art?
settings.text: You can clean your glass wall art using "Windex."

settings.title: Can I use the glass wall art outdoor?
settings.text: Yes, you can use our glass wall art outside. The UV printing method we use, along with tempered glass, ensures they are weatherproof and heat resistant.

settings.title: What comes with the product?
settings.text: We provide hanging brackets with all product types. However, due to the variety of wall types, we do not supply screws and anchors.

settings.title: Can I hang my glass wall art in both orientations?
settings.text: No, the product you receive will be as advertised on our website. If you wish to change the orientation, you must inform us before we ship your order. Otherwise, you will receive the product as advertised. You can inform us through our support email: support@artdesigna.com

settings.title: Can you recommend a different mounting method?
settings.text: We do not recommend any mounting method other than the one we provide. Our method is the most secure. If you use another method and the product is damaged, we do not take responsibility.

settings.title: Can I request a specific or larger size for my glass wall art?
settings.text: We do not offer custom sizes for individual glass wall art orders. However, for orders of more than 10 large pieces, we can work with you on a project basis. For other products, we do offer custom sizes.

settings.title: What is the size, weight, and thickness of the glass wall art
settings.text:
Our glass wall art utilizes 4mm (0,16 Inch) tempered glass, also known as safety glass. These glasses are heat-resistant and weatherproof, making them suitable for various environments. We use the UV printing method, ensuring that the artwork is not affected by direct sunlight or rain.

Sizes and Weights:

- 43 x 27.5 inches:
1 piece = 20 lbs
For TRIO (3 pieces) = 60 lbs

- 28.5 x 18 inches:
1 piece = 9 lbs
For TRIO (3 pieces) = 27 lbs

- 22 x 14 inches:
1 piece = 4.5 lbs
For TRIO (3 pieces) = 13.5 lbs

- 16 x 10 inches:
1 piece = 2.5 lbs

- 12 x 7.5 inches:
1 piece = 1.5 lbs

- 40 x 40 inches:
1 piece = 30 lbs
For DUO (2 pieces) = 60 lbs

- 32 x 32 inches:
1 piece = 16 lbs
For DUO (2 pieces) = 32 lbs

- 24 x 24 inches:
1 piece = 10 lbs
For DUO (2 pieces) = 20 lbs
For QUADRO (4 pieces) = 40 lbs

- 20 x 20 inches:
1 piece = 7 lbs

- 16 x 16 inches:
1 piece = 5 lbs
For QUADRO (4 pieces) = 20 lbs

settings.title: Can I hang the glass wall art in a bathroom?
settings.text: Yes, humidity is not an issue for our glass wall art, making it suitable for bathroom walls.

settings.title: Can I hang the glass wall art above a radiator or in a heated area?
settings.text: Yes, you can hang our glass wall art above a radiator or in heated areas. The 4mm tempered glass is heat-resistant.

settings.title: I lost my wall hanging bracket, can I buy a new one?
settings.text: Yes, you can order your new hanging bracket from this link.

settings.title: Product & Warranty
Can I return my product for a refund?
settings.text:
Upon receiving your package, we will contact you to confirm the cancellation of your order. You will receive a full refund if the entire order is returned. For partial returns, you will be refunded for the value of the returned items.

For more information, please check our return policy from here.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a refund when the order doesn't have free shipping?
settings.text: When an order does not include free shipping, all shipping costs (including the return shipping) are handled by the customer.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a refund when the order has free shipping?
settings.text: When an order includes free shipping, only the cost of the return shipping is handled by the customer.

settings.title: I forgot to apply a discount. Can you refund me the difference?
settings.text: Yes, we can refund the difference if you forget to use your discount code.

settings.title: Can I cancel my order?
settings.text: You may cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it. After this period, the glass wall art will be in production and cannot be canceled.

settings.title: I have canceled my order. When will I receive a refund?
settings.text: Refunds are typically processed within 14 days of cancellation, though we strive to process them as soon as possible.

settings.title: Can I exchange any of your products?
settings.text:
Exchanges are possible! If you need to exchange a product, please return it for a refund and then place a new order. Please refer to our return policy [here] for more information.

If you need more help, you are always welcome to contact our support team!

settings.title: Returns & Refunds

settings.text: We're Here to Assist You
Need More Help?
If you need further assistance or have more questions, don't hesitate to reach out. Click the button below to contact our support team, and we'll be happy to help you with anything you need.
